name: Fox In The Coop
description:
Fox In The Coop is a casual game in which you play as a fox. You must hunt chickens from the local farmers in order to survive. Of course the more chickens you take the more your reputation goes up.

The farmers will eventually come after you with guns when you have taken too many chickens.

The game also has an online scoreboard so you can compete against the internet .

The game was made for the IGM Developers Contest in May of 2013. I have since added a few things to it and worked out some of the kinks.
